description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Phu Quoc, Vietnam. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Grand Opening: Phu Quoc Beachfront Gem with Daily Breakfast, Free-Flow Drinks Hour & Airport Transfers
hotels.description: Ultra-chic, beachy and pared back, this boutique hotel defines coastal cool on Vietnam’s island paradise of Phu Quoc. Spend your days moving seamlessly from alfresco breakfasts to poolside lounging, infinity pool swims and ocean dips - then do it all again. With its own beach club steps away, there’s never a dull moment. The music sets the mood, nightly fire shows light up the evening and games keep the fun going late into the night. Every sun-drenched morning, enjoy a la carte breakfast at Beach Club, watching the waves roll in. By evening, sip cocktails as the sky turns golden. Guests have access to Soul Boutique Hotel Phu Quoc’s nearby sister resort, Sailing Club Signature Resort Phu Quoc - a short free shuttle ride away - including a fitness centre, delectable dining at Sandals, The Market, plus The Spa, with tension-melting treatments, a sauna and steam room. After days full of activity, retreat to your accommodation, where minimalism and artistic flair collide.

hotels.title: Vietnam Family-Friendly Seaside Luxury in Phu Quoc with Oversized Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Nestled along the pristine shores of Ong Lang Beach, your tropical island paradise awaits. Designed to inspire connection and relaxation, this Mövenpick gem offers an abundance of facilities for all ages, including a sprawling beachfront pool, a fun-for-all kids' club and the brand's iconic Chocolate Hour experience. Savour 70 years of Mövenpick’s culinary heritage at one of two restaurants, rejuvenate in a luxurious spa with 15 treatment rooms and enjoy refreshing tipples at the Beach Club or Waverley Lounge. When it's time to explore, the bustling Duong Dong town, with its colourful markets and seafood restaurants, is just a short drive away.

hotels.vendor_name: la Verandah Resort - Phu Quoc -MGallery Collection
hotels.title: French Mansion-Inspired Phu Quoc Beachfront Haven with Two Restaurants & Pool
hotels.description: Overlooking the azure waters of the Gulf of Thailand and nestled amid lush tropical gardens, embrace a world of tropical bliss with a stay at this Phu Quoc resort inspired by the grandeur of a 1920s French colonial mansion. A part of the MGallery Hotel Collection, this boutique five-star property is thoughtfully crafted with deep, private balconies, high ceilings and vintage collectables furnishing its spacious rooms. Feel the romance in the air of this picturesque Vietnamese island as you lounge by the pool, sip on tiki cocktails from the beachfront Le Bar and feast on French and Mediterranean delicacies at The Peppertree and Le Jardin. For some pampering, head to TĨNH Wellness Sanctuary and indulge in restorative treatments. When you're not beach hopping, explore the vibrant Duong Dong Market and visit the traditional fishing villages.

hotels.vendor_name: Intercontinental   Phu Quoc  Long Beach Resort
hotels.title: Idyllic Phu Quoc Beachfront Oasis with Seven Restaurants & Four Pools
hotels.description: Wake up to the gentle sway of palms and tropical tranquillity with a luxurious stay at InterContinental Phu Quoc Long Beach Resort, an IHG Hotel. An ideal place to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life and indulge in the beauty of nature, enjoy total seclusion in a must-see destination known for pristine beaches, turquoise waters and lush forests. Unwind further at the award-winning HARNN Heritage Spa or soak up the sun at one of the resort’s four sparkling swimming pools. When evening falls, take your pick from a selection of superb restaurants serving a delicious array of local and international cuisine. Step beyond your villa to discover Phu Quoc’s powdery beaches, charming fishing villages and natural wonders. Explore the scenic trails of Phu Quoc National Park, snorkel vibrant reefs, or simply soak up the serenity of this island paradise.

hotels.title: Five-Star Award-Winning Phu Quoc Island Resort with Private Beachfront
hotels.description: You get the best of both worlds at the multi-award-winning Salinda Resort Phu Quoc - rated in Condé Nast Travelers’ Readers’ Choice top 30 resorts in Asia for 2020 and ranked among Vietnam’s top 25 hotels in Tripadvisor’s Best of the Best 2021 awards. This eco-friendly property on Vietnam’s largest island boasts a pristine private beach and lush, secluded gardens, yet is close to the buzz of Duong Dong town centre and Long Beach’s popular 20km stretch. Wake to the sound of birdsong and the lapping ocean in this sustainable, solar-friendly oasis, designed with suites and villas that bring the outside in. Then, join a master Indian practitioner for complimentary hatha yoga, explore the island via bike (free for in-house guests) or plunge into the palm tree-fringed saltwater infinity pool. Drink in ocean vistas from one of the deck chairs scattered along the golden beachfront or indulge with a massage at the onsite spa while the younger members of the family are at the Kids’ Club. In the evenings, take your pick from three onsite restaurants, including the award-winning iL Muro Italiano and Pakka Indian - both recognised at the World Luxury Restaurant Awards 2020. With the hotel located just a 10-minute drive from Phu Quoc International Airport, you’ll have sand between your toes and a cocktail in hand in no time, watching the sunset over the ocean at this secluded five-star retreat. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select packages):** - Indulge in **daily** **buffet** **breakfast** at Salinda Restaurant - Unwind with a **daily signature cocktail, beer or glass of wine** per adult - Enjoy one **lunch or dinner for two** at one of the onsite restaurants (for stays of 3+ nights) - Treat yourself to one **60-minute Thai massage** **per adult** (for stays of 5+ nights) - Splurge with **US$100** **resort** **credit** per package (for stays of 7+ nights) - Enjoy an **additional lunch or dinner for two** (two total; for stays of 9+ nights) **Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2021** Top 25 Hotels - Vietnam **Pearl Suite Villa Upgrade:** The largest of all the villas on the property, this glorious accommodation has a marble bathroom with a freestanding bathtub and spacious private terrace enveloped by the resort’s lush gardens.

hotels.title: Stylish Five-Star Phu Quoc Stay with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Escape to the Regent Phu Quoc, an idyllic tropical retreat perfectly illuminated by the setting sun. Savour gastronomic experiences at the onsite restaurants and artisanal cocktails at the rooftop bar. Find moments of tranquility with indulgent spa treatments and yoga classes. Work up a sweat in the 24-hour fitness centre or take a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool. Walk through pristine white sands, take in tropical vistas or dip into crystal-clear waters before retiring to your sumptuous suite.

hotels.title: Pullman Phu Quoc Beachfront Luxury with Six Restaurants & Lagoon Pool
hotels.description: Bask in the captivating allure of Phu Quoc - Vietnam's largest island - at this five-star Pullman sanctuary, blending an enviable mix of world-class service and beachfront luxury. This flagship Pullman resort sprawls over seven hectares and boasts an impressive, unique design accentuated by fluid lines, curious artwork and decadent rooms. Spend your days under the tropical sun swimming in the expansive lagoon pool, dip your toes in the powder-soft sands of the private Long Beach and venture out into the translucent waters of the Gulf of Thailand on a kayak or a paddleboard. Plus, you can delight your tastebuds across the resort's six restaurants and bars, including a steakhouse, and a seafood pop-up as you sip on signature cocktails while catching epic ocean sunsets.

hotels.vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Phu Quoc Starbay Vietnam
hotels.title: Beachfront Phu Quoc Haven with Ultra-Cool Beach Club
hotels.description: Wake up to the sounds of waves crashing from oceanfront paradise at Crowne Plaza Phu Quoc Starbay, an IHG Hotel. With the idyllic Bai Dai beach at its doorstep, the hotel is in prime position for seaside enjoyment. When you're not lapping up the laidback coastal vibes, enjoy a splash in the hotel swimming pool, be wined and dined at the Horizons Restaurant, or live it up at the ultra-cool Amber Sands Beach Club. If you have kids in tow, drop them off at Tribe Kids' Club for endless fun.
